articles.title: In bitter cold, Polar Adventure Days goes on as planned at Northerly Island Park: ‘Life doesn’t stop’
articles.description: Dozens of families happily embraced the weather, praising the benefits of the annual event: fresh air, natural beauty and a break from technology. Among the fan favorites were the huskies sledding around the park.
articles.content:
Rosy-cheeked children and men with icicles in their beards battled the bitter cold for a few hours of fun at Northerly Island Park on Saturday.
They built forts out of recycled Christmas trees, watched an ice sculptor chisel a snow owl, balanced on a... [3520 chars]

articles.title: See the world beyond machine, technology, says Dr Mathew
articles.description: staff reporter : “use technology and ai, if you want to be competitive, but at the same time, be value-driven, respect people and see the world beyond machine and beyond technology with your heart,” said dr sibichen k ma
articles.content:
Staff Reporter :
“Use technology and AI, if you want to be competitive, but at the same time, be value-driven, respect people and see the world beyond machine and beyond technology with your heart,” said Dr Sibichen K Mathew, Director General of Inco... [1901 chars]

articles.title: Dale Vince, the eco-millionaire who now hates heat pumps
articles.description: The Ecotricity founder and Labour donor talks Gaza, his expensive divorce and how he’s developing technology to help humans eat grass
articles.content: Vince supports the government’s plan to provide people with interest-free loans for roof solar panels, which he believes can pay for themselves in savings over eight years and ultimately “lift people out of poverty”. But he takes issue with grants fo... [6383 chars]

articles.title: Rural Technology Development and Dissemination for Rural Prosperity
articles.description: Dr. Banarsi Lal kvkreasi@gmail.com                                                                    26Agricultural growth is considered as the key pathway to resolve poverty and food insecurity especially in the developing nations.Agricultural productivity depends on the technology uptake and utilization.Over the years many organisations have targeted in improving the agricultural productivity through the introduction of various innovations.Some of such efforts include subsidies on inputs such as seed,fertilizers,introduction of drought and disease resistant varieties, use of ICTs etc. Spectacular progress has been achieved in agricultural production in the country […]

articles.title: The Complete Evolution Of Hulk's On-Screen Live-Action Appearances
articles.description: From Ferrigno’s nightmarish brute to Smart Hulk and Red Hulk’s turn to terror, Hulk’s live-action evolution reflects changing ideas and technology.
articles.content: Few characters in pop culture have undergone as many visual reinventions as the Hulk. Unlike most Marvel superheroes, Hulk’s entire identity is tied to physical transformation, meaning every new live-action iteration has offered their own interpretat... [8614 chars]

articles.title: The century-long battle against weeds heads to space
articles.description: It might have a romantic name but African lovegrass wreaks havoc on the landscape, as researchers trial satellite technology and AI to combat the invasive weed.
articles.content:
On sweeping and sometimes snowy plains in prime grazing country, an environmental threat lurks in the grass.
Invasive weed African lovegrass is a "beast" farmers in the NSW Snowy Monaro region have been battling for more than a century, the council's... [2485 chars]

articles.title: Mumbai Infra News: BMC Drops Plan To Demolish Goregaon’s Veer Savarkar Flyover For Versova-Dahisar Link Road After IIT Bombay Clears Monopile Design
articles.description: The BMC has decided not to demolish the seven-year-old Veer Savarkar flyover in Goregaon after IIT Bombay approved revised designs using monopile technology. The move allows the flyover to be retained while advancing the Versova–Dahisar Link Road project, averting major traffic disruption.
articles.content: Mumbai, Jan 24: The revised drawings submitted by the contractor to the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay, assessing the feasibility of monopile technology as an alternative to demolition, have been approved. As a result, the BMC will not d... [1775 chars]

articles.title: The Future of Smart Home Comfort: Why Water Heater Technology Matters in the Connected Age
articles.description: Smart Homes Are Evolving Beyond Gadgets Smart home technology has moved far beyond novelty gadgets and voice-controlled lights. Today’s homeowners expect their homes to be intelligent, efficient, and responsive to real-life needs. From learning thermostats to app-controlled security systems, technology is now deeply integrated into daily living. One essential system, however, is often overlooked in […]

articles.description: ISLAMABAD  -  A Chinese agricultural technology firm and a Pakistani agribusiness company have entered into a collaboration to introduce improved peanut seeds
articles.content: ISLAMABAD - A Chinese agricultural technology firm and a Pakistani agribusiness company have entered into a collaboration to introduce improved peanut seeds and build a local supply chain, reflecting growing cross-border farm investment amid expandin... [2107 chars]
